channel.title: RS-Remade | Relive Your Memories [2006 Remake]
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zJEUw.png[/img]
Welcome to RS-Remade.
RS-Remade is a remake of old RuneScape in 2006. The base is the original Shard Revolutions released by Graham. Feel free to ask any questions, I will gladly answer them as soon as possible.
[ul][*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/attack.png[/img] [b]Links[/b][list] [*][url=http://www.rs-remade.com]Official Website[/url] [*][url=http://www.youtube.com/RSRemade2006]Youtube[/url][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/combat.png[/img] [b]Combat[/b] [list][*][COLOR=Red]All special attacks[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Clipping[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Correct animations for all weapons (walk, run, stand, attack, block)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Correct timers[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Orange]Equipment effects (barrows)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Perfect Max Hit Formula[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Orange]PvN[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Orange]PvP[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Weapon degrading (barrows)[/COLOR][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/magic.png[/img] [b]Mage[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]Ancient spells[/COLOR][list] [*][COLOR=Red]Dust[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Ice[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Shadow[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Smoke[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Teleports[/COLOR][/list] [*][COLOR=Red]Clipping[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Orange]Modern spells[/COLOR][list] [*][COLOR=Green]Alches[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Basic combat spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Binding spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Bones to bananas[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Bones to peaches[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Charge[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Charge Orbs[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Curses[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Enchanting jewelery[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]God spells[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Iban blast[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Slayer dart[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Teleblock[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Telekinetic Grab[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Teleothers[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Teleports[/COLOR][/list] [*][COLOR=Green]Staffs giving unlimited runes[/COLOR][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/ranged.png[/img] [b]Range[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]All special attacks[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Clipping[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Crystal bow[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Dwarf cannon[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Perfect Max Hit Formula[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Throwables[/COLOR][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/prayer.png[/img] [b]Prayer[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Orange]All prayers[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Green]Bone burying[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Red]Ectofuntus[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=Orange]Prayer draining[/COLOR][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/agility.png[/img] [b]Agility[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]All obstacles[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Ape Atoll course[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Brimhaven course[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Gnome course[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Wilderness course[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/cooking.png[/img] [b]Cooking[/b][list] [*][COLOR=Red]Brewing[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Cakes[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Cooking gauntlets[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Dairy[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Double xp on Cook's Assistant range[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Fish[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Meat[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Miscellaneous[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Compost bin[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Flowers[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Herbs[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Hops[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Fruit trees[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Protecting crops[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Specials[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Tool leprechauns[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Trees[/color][/list] [*][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/firemaking.png[/img] [*][COLOR=Green]Colored fires[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Fires burn out and leave ashes[/color] [*][COLOR=Red]Perfect firemaking formula[/color][/list] [*][COLOR=Green]Equipment checking[/color] [*][COLOR=Green]Fishing spots around the world[/color] [*][COLOR=Orange]Moving fishing spots[/color][/list] item.title: RS-Remade | Relive Your Memories [2006 Remake]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[youtube]www.youtube.com/watch?v=XzqJTW8RCDc[/youtube]

Herblore is the latest skill to be finished on RS-Remade!

Herblore includes:
[ul][]All potions
[]Cleaning poison from weapons
[]Coconut milk making
[]Grinding materials
[]Pouring together doses (not shown in video)
[]Weapon poisoning[/ul]

This is the second skill to be finshed this month, and the second skill finished in RS-Remade history.

Please comment and thumbs up the video, and subscribe to our channel if you havent already!

[quote=“latifundio, post:70, topic:430133”]^Cool stuff, now don’t forget about bow strings. Even if it is crafting, fletching is not complete with out it.[/quote]Bow strings are there, it was just not shown in the video.

Read full topic

Be sure to comment and thumbs up the video, and don’t forget to subscribe to our channel if you haven’t already!
